bibl.title: 'Interpreting' at Vindolanda: Commercial and Linguistic Mediation in the Roman Army.
bibl.note: Introduction. - T. Vind. II, 213: 'ut interpreteris'. - A parallel (or precursor) from Frisia: 'Quadratus interpretavit'. - Interpreters and the Roman authorities. - Roman military interpreters in the Danubian provinces. - Commercial interpreters-middlemen. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Rachel Mairs, 'Interpreting' at Vindolanda: Commercial and Linguistic Mediation in the Roman Army.

Introduction. - T. Vind. II, 213: 'ut interpreteris'. - A parallel (or precursor) from Frisia: 'Quadratus interpretavit'. - Interpreters and the Roman authorities. - Roman military interpreters in the Danubian provinces. - Commercial interpreters-middlemen. - Avec résumé en anglais.
